articles.description: TAIPEI (The Straits Times/Asia News Network) Taiwanese-American singer Wang Leehom's divorce saga showed few signs of ebbing as his estranged wife Lee Jinglei posted again on Thursday (Dec 23) to rebut claims against her.

articles.title: People face long lines as they rush to get tested for COVID ahead of the holidays - NPR
articles.description: Americans are scrambling to find out if they're COVID-free so they can go through with their plans. But for many, that means queuing up for hours or tracking down scarce at-home testing kits.
articles.content: People wait in long lines in Times Square to get tested for COVID-19 on Monday. New York City, which was initially overwhelmed by the pandemic, has once again seen case numbers surge as the new omicr… [+3226 chars]
